title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-featured online store with payment integration
longDescription: Built a comprehensive e-commerce platform with Laravel backend and React frontend. Features include product management, shopping cart, secure checkout with Stripe integration, order tracking, and admin dashboard. Implemented real-time inventory updates and customer notifications.

title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: Livewire-powered chat app with WebSocket support
longDescription: Developed a modern real-time chat application using Laravel Livewire and WebSockets. Features include private messaging, group chats, file sharing, typing indicators, and message reactions. Used Laravel Echo for real-time broadcasting.

title: Portfolio Builder SaaS
description: Next.js app for creating professional portfolios
longDescription: Created a SaaS platform that allows users to build and customize their professional portfolios without coding. Built with Next.js 14, featuring drag-and-drop interface, template library, custom domain support, and SEO optimization tools.

title: Task Management System
longDescription: Built a comprehensive task management system for teams. Features include kanban boards, gantt charts, time tracking, team collaboration, file attachments, and automated notifications. Implemented with Laravel API and React frontend.
